name: Deep Breathing
description: A basic breathing exercise to calm the mind.
posture: Sit comfortably with your back straight.
steps: Inhale slowly through your nose for 4 seconds.
Exhale slowly through your mouth for 4 seconds.

name: Body Scan Meditation
description: Guided meditation to increase body awareness.
posture: Lie down or sit comfortably with eyes closed.
steps: Focus on your toes and notice any sensations.
Move attention slowly upward through your body.
Release tension as you scan each area.
End the scan at the top of your head.
